items.name: Zero to One: Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future
The Hard Thing About Hard Things: Building a Business When There Are No Easy Answers

items.description:
Ridley Scott, 2015
During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.
items.name: The Martian

items.description:
J.J. Abrams, 2015
Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.
items.name: Star Wars: The Force Awakens

items.description:
Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen, 2015
After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
items.name: Inside Out

items.description:
HBO, 2014- 
In the high-tech gold rush of modern Silicon Valley, the people most qualified to succeed are the least capable of handling success. A comedy partially inspired by Mike Judge's own experiences as a Silicon Valley engineer in the late 1980s.
items.name: Silicon Valley

items.description:
SHO, 2006-2013.
A Miami police forensics expert moonlights as a serial killer of criminals whom he believes have escaped justice.
items.name: Dexter

items.description:
AMC, 2008-2013
A chemistry teacher diagnosed with terminal lung cancer teams up with his former student to cook and sell crystal meth.
items.name: Breaking Bad
The Dark Side of the Moon
Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
